topic.title: Labor and Delivery Process - conformance rules

lines.i: The template contains information directly associated with the labor and delivery process. It captures the act of labor and delivery, and includes information for the birth attendant and location.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.31"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:89)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:91)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:90)/@code="57074-7" Labor and delivery process (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:455)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it contains information regarding the labor and delivery process.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] performer (CONF:92)
Information on the person attending the birth.
This performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRF" (CONF:101)
This performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:102)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ASSIGNED" (CONF:103)
This assignedEntity SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:104)
An identifier for the birth attendant. The national provider id is expected. A state registration id may be provided as well. Within the II data type, use the root to record the identifying OID for the namespace that the identifier value is drawn from.
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:106), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Birth Attendant Title (NCHS) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7111 STATIC December 1, 2013 (CONF:107)
An indication of the professional qualification of the birth attendant. Their title. If the code - 394841004 (other category) - is chosen, the original text property is used to record a text value.
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson (CONF:456)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PSN" (CONF:108)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:109)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:110)
The name of the birth attendant

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant (CONF:94)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" (CONF:118)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:117)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="BIRTHPL" (CONF:119)
This participantRole SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] id (CONF:120)
An identifer for the facility within which the delivery took place. This attribute is not relevant if the birth took place outside of a health care facility. The attribute repeats to allow entry of both state and nationally assigned identifiers. Within the II data type, use the root to record the identifying OID for the namespace that the identifier value is drawn from.
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:121), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Birth Delivery Location (NCHS) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7124 STATIC December 1, 2013 (CONF:122)
A code that indicates the type of facility or place at which the delivery took place.
This participantRole MAY contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:123)
The address for the place where the delivery took place. It is collected in those cases where the delivery did not occur within a healthcare facility.
This participantRole SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] playingEntity (CONF:124)
This playingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PLC" (CONF:127)
This playingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:128)
This playingEntity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] name (CONF:126)
The name of the facility at which the delivery took place.
This playingEntity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] desc (CONF:125)
A description of the place where the birth took place. The attribute is used for those cases in which the delivery occurred neither at a healthcare facility, nor at a place with a defined postal address. If this birth occurred en route, that is, in a moving conveyance, enter the city, town, village, or location where the child was first removed from the conveyance. If the birth occurred in international air space or waters, enter "plane" or "boat."

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:95)
Information on whether or not a home birth was planned is only collected for births that take place at home.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Planned Home Birth (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.26)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:96)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Maternal Transfer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.35)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:97)
Characteristics of labor and delivery information is collected for a live birth certificate, but not for a fetal death report.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Characteristic of Labor and Delivery (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.18)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:98)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Maternal Morbidity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.34)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:99)
There may be multiple risk factors recorded. At least one observation will be present in the case that none of cited risk factors are present.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pregnancy Risk Factor (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.44)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:100)
Information on the source of payment for the delivery. Not collected for a fetal death report.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:111)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:112)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:113)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:115)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:114)/@code="68461-3" Payment source (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:457)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - that it includes payment source information.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:116), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Birth and Fetal Death Financial Class (NCHS) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7163 STATIC December 1, 2013 (CONF:458)
Information to identify the source of payment for charges associated with delivering the baby.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:89)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:91)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:90)/@code="57074-7" Labor and delivery process (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:455)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it contains information regarding the labor and delivery process.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] performer (CONF:92)
Information on the person attending the birth.
This performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRF" (CONF:101)
This performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:102)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ASSIGNED" (CONF:103)
This assignedEntity SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:104)
An identifier for the birth attendant. The national provider id is expected. A state registration id may be provided as well. Within the II data type, use the root to record the identifying OID for the namespace that the identifier value is drawn from.
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:106), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Birth Attendant Title (NCHS) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7111 STATIC December 1, 2013 (CONF:107)
An indication of the professional qualification of the birth attendant. Their title. If the code - 394841004 (other category) - is chosen, the original text property is used to record a text value.
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson (CONF:456)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PSN" (CONF:108)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:109)
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:110)
The name of the birth attendant

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant (CONF:94)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" (CONF:118)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:117)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="BIRTHPL" (CONF:119)
This participantRole SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] id (CONF:120)
An identifer for the facility within which the delivery took place. This attribute is not relevant if the birth took place outside of a health care facility. The attribute repeats to allow entry of both state and nationally assigned identifiers. Within the II data type, use the root to record the identifying OID for the namespace that the identifier value is drawn from.
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:121), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Birth Delivery Location (NCHS) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7124 STATIC December 1, 2013 (CONF:122)
A code that indicates the type of facility or place at which the delivery took place.
This participantRole MAY contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:123)
The address for the place where the delivery took place. It is collected in those cases where the delivery did not occur within a healthcare facility.
This participantRole SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] playingEntity (CONF:124)
This playingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PLC" (CONF:127)
This playingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:128)
This playingEntity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] name (CONF:126)
The name of the facility at which the delivery took place.
This playingEntity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] desc (CONF:125)
A description of the place where the birth took place. The attribute is used for those cases in which the delivery occurred neither at a healthcare facility, nor at a place with a defined postal address. If this birth occurred en route, that is, in a moving conveyance, enter the city, town, village, or location where the child was first removed from the conveyance. If the birth occurred in international air space or waters, enter "plane" or "boat."

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:95)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Planned Home Birth (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.26)
Information on whether or not a home birth was planned is only collected for births that take place at home.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:96)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Maternal Transfer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.35)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:97)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Characteristic of Labor and Delivery (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.18)
Characteristics of labor and delivery information is collected for a live birth certificate, but not for a fetal death report.

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:98)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Maternal Morbidity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.34)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:99)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pregnancy Risk Factor (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.44)
There may be multiple risk factors recorded. At least one observation will be present in the case that none of cited risk factors are present.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:100)
Information on the source of payment for the delivery. Not collected for a fetal death report.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:111)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:112)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:113)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:115)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:114)/@code="68461-3" Payment source (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:457)
